landing.bio1:
I'm a software engineer excited about back-end services, object-oriented programming, cross-platform frameworks and distributed systems.
 I currently work at Simplifile as a back-end developer, study CS with an emphasis in Software Engineering at Brigham Young University, and contribute to open source projects when I feel like coding in my spare time.
landing.bio2: I currently work at Simplifile as a back-end developer, study CS with an emphasis in Software Engineering at Brigham Young University, and I build applications in Flutter and contribute to open source projects when I feel like coding in my spare time.
landing.bio3: Other than that, I love to follow the latest news in big tech, read, play piano, am an active member of my local religious group, and I enjoy spending time cooking and watching Netflix with my wife.

experience.aboutWork: Full-time member of team overseeing our Lender product. Build & maintain business logic, databases, APIs and other back-end components.
Assisted project managers with analyzing performance reports, responded to customer feature requests and bug reports, worked with development team to define enhancements.

experience.organization: The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints
experience.aboutWork: My time as a missionary was spent serving individuals and families, teaching them about the restored gospel of Jesus Christ, and helping them make changes to improve their quality of life.
Onboarded new customers for new Collaboration & Post Closing product and provided customer support.

education.degree: Bachelor of Computer Science, Emphasis in Software Engineering

interests.paragraphOne: Apart from being a web developer, I enjoy most of my time being outdoors. In the winter, I am an avid skier and novice ice climber. During the warmer months here in Utah, I enjoy hiking, camping, and swimming.
interests.paragraphTwo: When forced indoors, I follow a number of sci-fi and fantasy genre movies and television shows, I am an aspiring chef, and I spend a large amount of my free time exploring the latest technology advancements in the front-end web development world.

projects.name: Touchbar Information
projects.description: My first React project, focused on simple, streamlined web design.

projects.name: Get2gether
projects.description: My first Flutter project, focused on a clean, intuitive mobile design.

projects.name: Let's Go! Companion App
projects.description: A video game companion app to help players track in-game progress.

projects.name: Ripceipt
projects.description: An application to organize receipts sent by NFC from Ripceipt printer software.
